getLoader

public static Loader getLoader(java.lang.String identifier)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Get a specified loader that contains the specified resource.

Parameters:
identifier - Resource identifier.
Returns:
A loader that has the resource or null if none found.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If any exception happens while checking for a resource.

getLoaders

public static Loader[] getLoaders()
Load all loaders available from the classpath.

Returns:
An array with all loaders available.
